name: Adecco Group
description: We believe in people and their place in the world of work. Everything we do as a company reflects our desire to continually evolve the concept of work for today and tomorrow. We pride ourselves on our ability to deliver a wide range of multi-disciplinary solutions across all sectors and areas of employment. We deliver people solutions on a local and international level, shaping the future of work and the global employment landscape. Our solutions are trusted worldwide and provide a global conscience in human resources. We believe that where work is allowed to thrive, economies grow, and societies prosper. We therefore see it as our duty to provide decision-makers with insight and recommendations, organisations with people and infrastructure, and ultimately, individuals with opportunities. We believe that we’re in a unique position to help organisations navigate change.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Making the future work for everyone

Highlights.name: Global Leader in Staffing and Workforce Solutions
Highlights.description: The Adecco Group is the world's second-largest human resources provider, offering a wide range of staffing solutions to businesses across various industries.

Highlights.name: Temporary & Permanent Staffing
Highlights.description: The Adecco Group caters to both temporary staffing needs for short-term projects and permanent placements to help businesses build their long-term workforce

Highlights.name: Beyond Staffing: Career & Talent Development
Highlights.description: The Adecco Group goes beyond just filling positions. They offer services like career transition assistance and talent development programs to help both businesses and individuals thrive.

enhanced_description: The Adecco Group is a global leader and the world's second-largest human resources provider, offering a comprehensive suite of workforce solutions. They specialize in evolving the concept of work by delivering multi-disciplinary services across all sectors and areas of employment, on both local and international scales. Their offerings include temporary staffing for short-term projects and permanent placements, alongside strategic services such as career transition assistance, talent development programs, and business process management. Adecco aims to provide decision-makers with insights and recommendations, equip organizations with people and infrastructure, and ultimately offer individuals opportunities, positioning themselves uniquely to help organizations navigate change and foster economic growth.

Providing HR consulting and workforce management support.
